newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: L&M Group withdraws S$92 mln rights issu.
newsitem.headline: L&M Group withdraws S$92 mln rights issu.

text.p: Construction company L&M Group Investments Ltd (L&M) said on Saturday it had withdrawn a proposed one-for-one rights issue to raise Singapore $92.0 million.
The company said in a statement that it was also pulling out of a residential development in Surabaya, Indonesia, where part of the funds raised would have been used.
L&M said its decision was due to an offer to buy its 35 percent stake in Malaysian associate company L&M Corp (M) Bhd.
"The company will undertake a fresh review of its funding requirements and how they can best be met when the result of the negotiation is know," L&M said.
